critique: The document is an executive order imposing sanctions on Burma due to its repression of the democratic opposition. It utilizes the International Emergency Economic Powers Act and other legal authorities to block assets, prohibit transactions, and restrict imports from Burma. The order includes waivers for certain international obligations and allows for exceptions and modifications by the Secretary of the Treasury and the Secretary of State. It also revokes conflicting sections of a previous executive order and clarifies that it does not create enforceable rights against the United States.
